front.title: Houjix
front.gametext: During the damage segment of a battle you lost, if you have no cards left that can be forfeited, cancel all remaining battle damage. (Immune to Sense.) OR Cancel Sunsdown.
front.lore: Dejarik creature. These ferocious-looking beasts are gentle, loyal, and often domesticated as guard animals or pets on Kinyen, the Gran homeworld. Incendiary.

combo: Houjix + BG-J38 Adds 2 to the destiny of each of your holograms and dejariks drawn for battle destiny or weapon destiny.
